meanings.definition: In a direction from the apex towards the base.
meanings.sent1: The plant's leaves curled basipetally as they grew downwards.
meanings.sent2: The water flowed basipetally from the top of the mountain to the valley below.
meanings.sent3: The ants marched basipetally towards their anthill, carrying food.
meanings.sent4: The music notes seemed to cascade basipetally, creating a soothing melody.
meanings.sent5: The snowflakes fell basipetally, covering the ground in a soft blanket.

meanings.definition: Growing or developing in a downward direction.
meanings.sent1: The basipetally growing roots anchored the tree firmly in the ground.
meanings.sent2: The basipetally expanding roots reached deep into the soil for nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The basipetally growing vines created a beautiful curtain along the wall.
meanings.sent4: The basipetally spreading branches provided shade on hot summer days.
meanings.sent5: The basipetally growing ivy covered the old building in a green embrace.
